Name: Omicroid
About the game: Omicroids are tiny alien organisms that came to Earth on an asteroid. They're new to this planet, so we don't know much about them. It's up to you to discover what it takes to keep each species happy. Create experiments, manipulate variables, collect data, and form conclusions based on your findings. Omicroid features 50+ hand-made & animated claymation models. Gameplay features include: Hatching and raising Omicroids in petri dishes and test tubes Setting up experiments by placing shards & playing music Combining shard auras to create unique habitats Collecting coins that double as data points Discovering the unique preferences of every species Unlocking 50+ species Collecting rare variants Reflex events that reward a quick response Completing your Micropedia
